content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord eager to secure the highest possible rent for my apartment in Duisburg, let us begin our negotiation regarding the rental price. 

However, please note that during this discussion, we will focus solely on the rental amount and not touch upon additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs like heating, water, or electricity. When you propose a rental price that meets my expectations, you can say, 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Should you wish to discontinue the negotiation, inform me with a reason using the phrase 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason].' Once we agree on a price, the negotiation will be terminated with the sentence 'TERMINATE.' Let us commence.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
